ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scaffval.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | scaffval.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | scaffval.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 4 |  | scaffval.a | |- .xb = ( .sf ` W ) |
| 5 |  | scaffval.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fnov | |- ( .x. Fn ( K X. B ) <-> .x. = ( x e. K , y e. B |-> ( x .x. y ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biimpi | |- ( .x. Fn ( K X. B ) -> .x. = ( x e. K , y e. B |-> ( x .x. y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_scaffval | |- .xb = ( x e. K , y e. B |-> ( x .x. y ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( .x. Fn ( K X. B ) -> .xb = .x. ) |
